DataElement.preferredName: One Or Many New Lesion Identification Since Study Begin Yes No Numeric Indicator Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded numeric indicators for Yes (1) or No (0)  in answer to the question if the patient has one or more new lesions since study start.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: One Or Many New Lesion Identification Since Study Begin
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._More than one._The identification of a lesion which has not been previously seen or characterized._Subsequent to; after._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it; the activities undertaken during a study._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.

ObjectClass.preferredName: One Or Many New Lesion Identification
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:More than one.:The identification of a lesion which has not been previously seen or characterized.

Concepts.definition: The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
An indefinite large quantity that is considered to be greater than several.
The identification of a lesion which has not been previously seen or characterized.

Property.preferredDefinition: Subsequent to; after.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it; the activities undertaken during a study.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.

Concepts.definition: A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Coded numeric indicators for Yes (1) or No (0)  in answer to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary):A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.
